com.software.reuze

Class gb_SplineCatmull

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.software.reuze.gb_SplineCatmull
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class gb_SplineCatmull
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Encapsulates a catmull rom spline with n control points, n >= 4. For more information on this type of spline see http://www.mvps.org/directx/articles/catmull/.
    Author:
    badlogicgames@gmail.com
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Returns a path, between every two control points numPoints are generated and the control points themselves are added too.

      Returns the tangent's normals using the tangent and provided up vector doing a cross product.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public void add(gb_Vector3 point)
        Adds a new control point
        Parameters:
        point - the point

      • getControlPoints

        public List<gb_Vector3> getControlPoints()
        Returns:
        all control points

      • getPath

        public List<gb_Vector3> getPath(int numPoints)
        Returns a path, between every two control points numPoints are generated and the control points themselves are added too. The first and the last control point are omitted. if there's less than 4 control points an empty path is returned.
        Parameters:
        numPoints - number of points returned for a segment
        Returns:
        the path

      • getPath

        public void getPath(gb_Vector3[] points,
           int numPoints)
        Returns a path, between every two control points numPoints are generated and the control points themselves are added too. The first and the last control point are omitted. if there's less than 4 control points an empty path is returned.
        Parameters:
        points - the array of gb_Vector3 instances to store the path in
        numPoints - number of points returned for a segment

      • getTangents

        public List<gb_Vector3> getTangents(int numPoints)
        Returns all tangents for the points in a path. Same semantics as getPath.
        Parameters:
        numPoints - number of points returned for a segment
        Returns:
        the tangents of the points in the path

      • getTangentNormals2D

        public List<gb_Vector3> getTangentNormals2D(int numPoints)
        Returns all tangent's normals in 2D space for the points in a path. The control points have to lie in the x/y plane for this to work. Same semantics as getPath.
        Parameters:
        numPoints - number of points returned for a segment
        Returns:
        the tangents of the points in the path

      • getTangentNormals

        public List<gb_Vector3> getTangentNormals(int numPoints,
                                 gb_Vector3 up)
        Returns the tangent's normals using the tangent and provided up vector doing a cross product.
        Parameters:
        numPoints - number of points per segment
        up - up vector
        Returns:
        a list of tangent normals

      • getTangentNormals

        public List<gb_Vector3> getTangentNormals(int numPoints,
                                 List<gb_Vector3> up)
